definition: variant of 窪|洼[wa1]/(used in names)

sentences.english: That way, you're ensured to have even nocks.
sentences.chinese: 这个方法，你要保证一致的凹槽。

sentences.english: The hoop cable, the welding joint and the groove of the drum body keep on a plane.
sentences.chinese: 箍索及焊接连接点与鼓身的凹槽保持一个平面。

sentences.english: The groove is provided with a firm metallurgically combined hard coating inside;
sentences.chinese: 该凹槽内设有牢固冶金结合的硬质涂层。

sentences.english: Milled groove; collects meat and fruit juices while cutting.
sentences.chinese: 压花凹槽，切割肉和水果时可汇集汁液。

sentences.english: The cold end is formed by cutting two longitudinal slots along the length of the tube.
sentences.chinese: 冷端部沿着管长方向有两个纵向的凹槽。

sentences.english: The clamping part is a clamping platform or a recess.
sentences.chinese: 所述卡装部为卡台或凹槽。

sentences.english: There were four notches in the handle of his revolver.
sentences.chinese: 他的左轮手枪枪柄上有四个凹槽。

sentences.english: Gear lubricants may congeal and channel in cold weather.
sentences.chinese: 天冷时齿轮润滑油可能凝结并形成凹槽。

sentences.english: What sober man's key could have scored those grooves?
sentences.chinese: 清醒的人怎么会用钥匙刮出那么多凹槽呢？

sentences.english: I use that to guide where I cut the nocks on both sides.
sentences.chinese: 我用这个来引导我要切割凹槽在两边的什么位置。

sentences.english: Cavitation pits and indentations were responsible for the loss of the surface brightness.
sentences.chinese: 腐蚀形成的坑和凹槽就是表面亮度下降的原因。

sentences.english: Gear lubricants may congeal and channel in cold weather.
sentences.chinese: 润滑油可能凝结而形成凹槽。

sentences.english: The cover body can rotate towards the groove until being attached to the casing body, so as to hold the telephone set.
sentences.chinese: 盖体可朝向凹槽转动至贴合壳体以夹持电话机。

sentences.english: The surfaces of the lead plates were not hollowed out to cup toothless gums; they were flat.
sentences.chinese: 铅制牙托的表面平坦，缺乏凹槽，无法覆盖牙床。

sentences.english: The rocks were folded by collapsing into the center of the trough.
sentences.chinese: 岩石由于坍陷进入凹槽的中心而发生褶皱。

sentences.english: Grooves extend to the finished edge, but rear perforations are not visible.
sentences.chinese: 凹槽延伸到成品的优势，但后排齿孔中不可见。

definition: see 赤嵌樓|赤嵌楼[Chi4 kan3 lou2]
